member.name: T:EqualMilking.Comps.CompCumBucketLink
member.summary: 精液桶关联床：可链接到一张床，床主在桶空时默认唯一可用；有占用时提示“不属于他的精液桶”。 共享卧室（房间内多床或无主床）时默认全员可用，排放为混合精液。

member.name: P:EqualMilking.Comps.CompCumBucketLink.Owner
member.summary: 床主（通过 CompAssignableToPawn 获取，兼容各版本）。

member.name: P:EqualMilking.Comps.CompCumBucketLink.IsSharedRoom
member.summary: 共享卧室：房间内多张床，或链接的床无主。

member.name: P:EqualMilking.Comps.CompCumBucketLink.HasContent
member.summary: 桶格上有精液物品即视为有占用。

member.name: M:EqualMilking.Comps.CompCumBucketLink.CanPawnUse(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: 该小人是否被允许使用此桶（做 DeflateBucket 等）。

member.name: M:EqualMilking.Comps.CompCumBucketLink.ShouldWarnNotYourBucket(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: 是否应提示“不属于他的精液桶”（有占用且不是他的桶）。

member.name: M:EqualMilking.Comps.CompCumBucketLink.NotifyPawnUsed(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: 记录该小人向此桶排放了一次；若多人用过则后续产出为混合精液。

member.name: P:EqualMilking.Comps.CompCumBucketLink.IsMixed
member.summary: 是否已有多人使用过（产出应为混合精液）。

member.name: P:EqualMilking.CompEquallyMilkable.Fullness
member.summary: 当前奶量 fullness（0~maxFullness），对外只读，用于调度 Job 优先级等。

member.name: F:EqualMilking.CompEquallyMilkable.allowedSucklers
member.summary: 谁可以吸我的奶。空列表 = 默认（子女+伴侣）；非空 = 仅列表中人。

member.name: F:EqualMilking.CompEquallyMilkable.allowedConsumers
member.summary: 谁可以使用我产出的奶/精液制品（不含自己，自己始终允许）。空列表 = 仅自己；非空 = 自己+列表中人。囚犯/奴隶产主时亦不默认允许殖民者（7.4）。

member.name: M:EqualMilking.CompEquallyMilkable.EnsureSaveCompatAllowedLists
member.summary: 7.11: 旧存档兼容 — 确保列表非 null 并移除已销毁的 Pawn 引用。加载后由 UpdateEqualMilkingSettings 调用。

member.name: M:EqualMilking.CompEquallyMilkable.SetFullness(System.Single)
member.summary: Set the fullness of the milkable pawn, will clamp the value between 0 and maxFullness
member.param: new fullness value

member.name: M:EqualMilking.CompEquallyMilkable.Gathered(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: Gather the milk from the milkable pawn, place the milk in the milking spot or the doer's position. Overrides vanilla method.
member.param: the pawn that is gathering the milk

member.name: M:EqualMilking.CompEquallyMilkable.AllowedToBeAutoFedBy(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: 是否允许被该泌乳者自动喂食。仅看 canBeFed 开关；不再使用「谁可以喂我」列表。

member.name: T:EqualMilking.HarmonyPatches.CumpilationIntegration
member.summary: 本 Mod 已合并 Cumpilation：为精液物品打产主(producer)，食用规则与奶制品一致(CompShowProducer + allowedConsumers)。 桶可关联床：仅床主可用空桶；占用时提示“不是你的桶”；共享卧室=混合精液。 7.13: 单源(ExtractCum、DeflateBucket 单主、Gathering from sex)设 producer；混合桶/清洁污物回收不设 producer。

member.name: M:EqualMilking.HarmonyPatches.CumpilationIntegration.JobGiver_Deflate_TryFindBucketFor_Postfix(Verse.Pawn,Verse.Thing@)
member.summary: Only allow bucket if CompCumBucketLink.CanPawnUse(pawn); otherwise clear result and prompt "not your cum bucket" when occupied.

member.name: M:EqualMilking.HarmonyPatches.CumpilationIntegration.GetProducerFromBucketDeflate(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: From JobDriver_DeflateBucket instance and current fluid, get the pawn to use as producer by reading cumflationHediff's SourceStorage sources (same fluid, pick by weight).

member.name: M:EqualMilking.HarmonyPatches.ProlactinAddictionPatch.HandleAddictionMechanics(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: 成瘾时将当前泌乳转为永久（severity=1，不再衰减），逻辑更顺：依赖药物=身体改变固定。

member.name: T:EqualMilking.HarmonyPatches.WorkGiver_Ingest_MilkProductFilter

member.summary: 进食开始时再次校验：若食物带 CompShowProducer.producer 且食用者不在允许范围内，则结束进食任务。

member.name: T:EqualMilking.HarmonyPatches.Patch_PostIngested_PartnerAteMyProduct
member.summary: 7.5：食用者吃完带产主的奶/精液制品后，若食用者是产主的伴侣，给产主轻微正面记忆。

member.summary: 统一泌乳判断：本体 Lactating 或 RJW 系 Lactating_Drug / Lactating_Permanent / Heavy_Lactating_Permanent。带 60 tick 缓存。

member.name: M:EqualMilking.Helpers.ExtensionHelper.ClearLactatingStateCache(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: 清除泌乳缓存（如 hediff 变更时可调，非必须）。

member.name: M:EqualMilking.Helpers.ExtensionHelper.SuckleRestrictionAllowed(Verse.Pawn,Verse.Pawn)

member.name: M:EqualMilking.Helpers.ExtensionHelper.IsDefaultSuckler(Verse.Pawn,Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: 默认“谁可以吸奶”：子女或伴侣。

member.name: M:EqualMilking.Helpers.ExtensionHelper.IsAllowedSuckler(Verse.Pawn,Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: 挤奶/吸奶时是否“自愿”：产主允许 doer 吸奶（7.5 自愿/强制框架）。

member.name: M:EqualMilking.Helpers.ExtensionHelper.CanConsumeMilkProduct(Verse.Pawn,Verse.Thing)
member.summary: 指定谁可以使用产出的奶/精液制品：无 producer 允许；自己始终允许；否则看产主 allowedConsumers，空=仅产主本人（囚犯/奴隶亦同，不默认允许殖民者，见 7.4）。

member.name: T:EqualMilking.UI.Widget_CumpilationSettings
member.summary: 精液/Cumpilation 设置：膨胀、填充、覆盖、收集、泄精等，统一到主 mod 设置的一个 Tab。

member.name: T:EqualMilking.UI.Window_ProducerRestrictions

member.name: M:EqualMilking.PawnColumnWorker_MilkType.GetMinHeaderHeight(RimWorld.PawnTable)

member.name: M:EqualMilking.PawnColumnWorker_ProducerRestrictions.ShouldShowFor(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: 泌乳者或任意人形均可指定谁可食用我产出的奶/精液（合并后始终启用精液机制）。

member.name: F:HediffWithComps_EqualMilkingLactating.SeverityStepsPerUnit
member.summary: Granularity: 4 steps per severity (0.25). Stage table covers 0..MaxSeverityForStages; higher severity uses last stage.

member.name: M:HediffWithComps_EqualMilkingLactating.HasDrugInducedLactation(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: 仅吃过 Prolactin/Lucilactin（有耐受或成瘾）的泌乳期才给意识/操纵/移动增益。

member.name: M:HediffWithComps_EqualMilkingLactating.AddGainCapMods(Verse.HediffStage,System.Single)
member.summary: 按吃药多少（severity）叠加；数值来自设置 lactatingGainCapModPercent，受 lactatingGainEnabled 控制。

member.name: M:HediffWithComps_EqualMilkingLactating.GenStage(Verse.HediffStage@,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Stage formulas use float severity so 0.5 vs 0.9999 differ: more severity = more milk, faster growth, more hunger. addGain = 吃药引起的泌乳期才加的 capMods。

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Bukkake.BukkakeUtility
member.summary:
Initializes and Manages both the "Per Body-Part" Splashes on Bukkake as well as their controllers.
DevNote: Initially, the Bukkake implementation from Ed86-Cum had two mechanics that got removed. 1) The body-parts had a "Overspill" logic which means that if your chest was full, you'd get splashes on the arms and legs. 2) The Controller would calculate itself regularly. This is now done upon spawning parts and the controller just ticks down.
Also, all drawing got removed. The drawing framework people should take care of that (#Innocent)

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Bukkake.BukkakeUtility.CanBeCovered(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: Simple check if the pawn can be covered with fluids. Only some sanity checks and ruling animals out.
member.param: The pawn that might be covered.
member.returns: True if the pawn can be covered by fluid, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Bukkake.BukkakeUtility.PartitionSeverity(System.Single,System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Partitions a float into a sub-list of smaller floats whose sum is the initialSeverity. There will be atmost 3 * initialseverity parts, or max_parts, whatever is smaller. The size of each partition is capped at 1.0 (default).
member.param: Max number of partitions to create, default capped at 10
Max value for each entry, default capped at 1.0
member.returns: A list of floats whose sum is the original severity.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Bukkake.BukkakeUtility.TicksToCleanSplashFromSelf(Verse.Hediff,System.Single)
member.summary: Looks up the ticks (time) required to clean a splash from a body-part. In case of any error, null value or other issues, 240 (2s) is returned, which was the original cleanup time from frameworks. If the severity is lower (or higher) than 1, it is considerd as a linear co-efficient.

member.name: F:Cumpilation.Bukkake.HediffCompProperties_SpawnOrAdjustControllerHediff.summedSeverityRequiredForFullController
member.summary: How many of the sub-hediffs severity are required to have a 1.0 Severity of the corresponding Controller. Default 4.5 "full" (=Severity 1.0) parts to reach the full bukkake. For a normal pawn, there should be 6 or 7 bodyparts, so 4.5 is already quite a lot.

member.name: F:Cumpilation.Common.DefModExtension_PawnTargetting.blockingHediffs
member.summary: A list of hediffs that block spawning of this Hediff. If any is present, at any severity other than 0, `CanTargetPawn` will return false.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Common.FluidUtility.StoreFluidSource(Verse.Hediff,Verse.Pawn,rjw.SexFluidDef,System.Single)
member.summary: Tries to store a record of `FluidSource` in a given Hediff. In case the Hediff does not have a `HediffComp_SourceStorage` nothing will happen. If there already exists a Storage Entry for this Pawn and this fluid, it will be increased by the incoming amount.
member.param: The hediff to store a record in
The pawn that originated the Fluid
The type of fluid
The amount of fluid

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Common.FluidUtility.LikesCumflation(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: Returns true if the pawn likes cumflation / cumstuffing for one or the other reason. Important: This is a separate method intentionally, so it can be patched.
member.param: The pawn that maybe likes cumflation
member.returns: True, if the pawn likes cumflation from traits, quirks or zoophile.

member.name: F:Cumpilation.Common.HediffCompProperties_RandomlySpawnFilth.chanceBasedOnSeverity
member.summary: Scale the chance based on severity. If Chance is 50% and Severity is 50%, then there is a 25% final chance.

member.name: F:Cumpilation.Common.HediffCompProperties_RandomlySpawnFilth.onlyAtStagesHigherThan
member.summary: Only try to spawn filth if the current stage is higher than the specified number.

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Common.HediffComp_ChangeFluidfactorBasedOnSeverity
member.summary:
Adjusts the targetted SexParts fluid-amount based on a linear factor between a configured Max and Min value.
Example: Max 5, Min 2 Severity 100% -> 5.0 Severity 50% -> 3.5 Severity 0% -> 2.0 Severity 33% -> 3.0 Severity 66% -> 4.0 Severity 250% -> 5.0

member.name: F:Cumpilation.Common.IngestionOutcomeDoer_PawnTargetting.blockingHediffs
member.summary: A list of hediffs that block spawning of this Hediff. If any is present, at any severity other than 0, `CanTargetPawn` will return false.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Common.MapUtility.PawnIsOnHomeMap(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary:
Checks if the pawn is on the players home map.
Reason is that drones should only be punished for absence of queen if they are on the map and there is no queen. If they are on a mission, transport-pod etc. they should not get boni or mali.
member.param: The pawn for which to check map-presence.
member.returns: True if the pawn is on the home-map, False otherwise.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Common.PartUtility.FindFittingSexParts(Verse.Pawn,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
This method finds all relevant, targetted parts as specified.
A sanity check, if the pawn is valid / healthy and matches the configuration, is done earlier in `IsValidPawn`.
member.param: The pawn for which to find SexParts.
Consider Penises (using `RJW.PartHelper.Is_Penis`)
Consider Vaginas (using `RJW.PartHelper.Is_Vagina`)
Consider Breasts (using HomeBrew helper)
Consider Anus (using `RJW.PartHelper.Is_Anus`)
Consider SexParts that are not in any other category
only return the first (fitting) part.
only return parts that have fluid.
member.returns: All targetted SexParts of the pawn, or an empty List on Errors.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Common.PartUtility.IsValidPawn(Verse.Pawn,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Verse.HediffDef},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{RimWorld.TraitDef},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Does a bunch of checks on a pawn, if it is a valid target.
member.param: The pawn to check
Men are valid targets (Using RW.Gender)
Women are valid targets (using RW.Gender)
Futas are valid targets (using RJW.GenderUtility.IsFuta); Futa is checked before men and women.
Animals are valid targets.
Return an empty list if any of the HediffDefs is present at a severity other than 0.
member.returns: True if the pawn is a valid target, false if it cannot be targeted

member.name: M:Cumpilation.ModLog.Error(System.String)
member.summary: Logs the given message with [SaveStorage.ModId] appended.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.ModLog.Message(System.String)
member.summary: Logs the given message with [SaveStorage.ModId] appended.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.ModLog.Warning(System.String)
member.summary: Logs the given message with [SaveStorage.ModId] appended.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Cumflation.CumflationUtility.CumflatePawn(Verse.Pawn,Verse.Pawn,rjw.SexProps)
member.summary:
Manages Cumflation by adding and increasing the relevant Hediff, checked for each Genital.
Also does the check IF a pawn should be cumflated.
member.param: Donor of the fluid
Receiver of the fluid
Sexprops, always useful.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Cumflation.CumflationUtility.TryQueueOverflowingCumflation(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: If the pawn is "overflowing", i.E. the severity is over 1, it will try to start a Job to spray cum around. The Job will run until the Severity is below 1.
member.param: The pawn that might gets the Job.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Cumflation.CumflationUtility.GetOrCreateCumflationHediff(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: Gets (or creates) a Cumflation Hediff for the `inflated`-pawn, located in the Genitals BodyPart. The severity is set later in case of a new creation.
member.returns: A Cumflation Hediff of the inflated pawn.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Cumflation.CumflationUtility.CanBeCumflated(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: Modding - Hook. Default: All Pawns can be cumflated. Animals cannot be cumflated.
member.param: The pawn that might be cumflated.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Cumflation.CumflationUtility.DetermineCumflationSeverity(Verse.Pawn,System.Single,rjw.SexFluidDef)
member.summary:
Calculates the resulting Cumflation-Severity relative to the fluid-amount and pawns body size. Also used to determine "overflow".
This method is also used to determine "cumstuffed" despite the name.
member.param: The pawn that might be cumflated
The amount of fluid coming in.
FluidDef, optional for patching.
member.returns: The severity of the resulting cumflation

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Cumflation.CumflationUtility.FluidAmountRequiredToCumflatePawn(Verse.Pawn,rjw.SexFluidDef)
member.summary:
We assume a simple relation: 100 fluid per 1 Bodysize. The returning value will determine how much of the fluid is necessary for 1.0 cumflation severity.
This might be altered with Patches etc. or extra behaviour, which is why this is a separate method despite very simple logic.
member.param: The pawn for which
Optional for patches: For which fluid to check.
member.returns: A number how much fluid amount is necessary for a "full" cumflation, i.E. a cumflation result resulting in 1.0 cumflation severity.

member.name: F:Cumpilation.Cumflation.StuffingDef.resultingStuffedHediff
member.summary: Note: The Cumstuffed Hediff MUST have a `HediffComp_SharedSeverityPerDay` otherwise there will be issues.

member.name: F:Cumpilation.Cumflation.StuffingDef.amountOfFluidForFullStuffing
member.summary: The amount of Fluid required for making a 1.0 Severity Hediff of the relative xxx-stuffing.

member.name: F:Cumpilation.Cumflation.StuffingDef.thoughtThreshold
member.summary: How much severity does the resulting stuffing must have to give a thought?

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Cumflation.HediffCompProperties_SharedSeverityPerDay
member.summary:
Extension to the "HediffComp_SeverityPerDay" that adjusts depending on how many Hediffs with this Comp are present.
Example: You have 1 hediff with `-0.10` SeverityPerDay. It will behave as normal. Example 2: You have 3 hediffs with `-0.15` SeverityPerDay each. Because you have three, they will effectively reduce by `-0.05` each day, resulting in a "global" reduction of 0.15 amongst all.

member.name: F:Cumpilation.Cumflation.HediffCompProperties_VomitFluidMtb.mtbDays
member.summary: "mean time between" measured in days. If set to 1, there will be 1 vomiting per days (in random occurrence). If set to 2, there will be 0.5 vomiting per days, etc. If set to 0.1, there will be 10 vomitings per days

member.name: F:Cumpilation.Cumflation.HediffCompProperties_VomitFluidMtb.scaleWithSeverity
member.summary: If true, the "chance" of application is scaled with the Severity of the Stuffing. So if your stuffing is 1.0, it will have a "full mtbDays". Otherwise, if your stuffing is 0.5, it will will result in half as much Vomiting.

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Cumflation.HediffComp_SharedSeverityPerDay
member.summary:
Extension to the "HediffComp_SeverityPerDay" that adjusts depending on how many Hediffs with this Comp are present.
Example: You have 1 hediff with `-0.10` SeverityPerDay. It will behave as normal. Example 2: You have 3 hediffs with `-0.15` SeverityPerDay each. Because you have three, they will effectively reduce by `-0.05` each day, resulting in a "global" reduction of 0.15 amongst all.

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Cumflation.JobDriver_OverflowingCumflation
member.summary: - Stop the pawn flat / make it look like it - Spray correct outside of it - Spray until the cumflation is at <1.0

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Cumflation.JobDriver_VomitFluid.LookupRandomFilthDef(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: Checks the pawns "Stuffed" Hediffs and returns a fitting FilthDef. If there is none, it'll return the normal Filth_Vomit.
member.param: The Pawn which has stuffing-hediffs
member.returns: A filth fitting for the existing stuffing-hediffs, or a Filth_Vomit as fallback.

members.member: Tim -> Anal Rape -> Joe := Joe=(Receiver, Reverse) , Tim=(!Receiver,!Reverse) Tim -> Anal Riding (Reverse) -> Joe := Joe=(Receiver, Reverse) , Tim=(!Receiver,Reverse) Tim -> Anal Rape -> Eva := Eva=(Receiver, Reverse) , Tim=(!Receiver,!Reverse) Tim -> Cunnilingus (Reverse) -> Eva := Eva=(Receiver, Reverse) , Tim=(!Receiver,Reverse)

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Cumflation.StuffingUtility.StuffPawn(Verse.Pawn,Verse.Pawn,rjw.SexProps)
member.summary:
Manages Stuffing by adding and increasing the relevant Hediff, checked for each Genital. If the pawn is already "fully stuffed", old liquids get pushed out by reducing their severity. See the bottom of `StuffingUtility` for examples on the Behaviour.
Also does the check IF a pawn should be stuffed.
member.param: Donor of the fluid
Receiver of the fluid
Sexprops, always useful.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Cumflation.StuffingUtility.CanBeStuffed(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: Modding - Hook. Default: All Pawns can be Stuffed.
member.param: The pawn that might be stuffed.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Cumflation.StuffingUtility.GetMaximumCombinedStuffingSeverity(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: Mod-Hook, no initial behaviour planned. Default: All pawns can have 1 total stuffing severity.
member.param: The pawn that might be stuffed

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Cumflation.StuffingUtility.GetOrCreateStuffHediff(Verse.Pawn,rjw.SexFluidDef)
member.summary: Gets (or creates) a Stuffing Hediff for the `inflated`-pawn, located in the Genitals BodyPart. The severity is set later in case of a new creation.
member.returns: A Stuffed Hediff of the inflated pawn.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Cumflation.StuffingUtility.DetermineStuffingSeverity(Verse.Pawn,System.Single,rjw.SexFluidDef)
member.param: The pawn that will be checked for - bodysize is important.
The amount of incoming fluid
The incoming fluid
member.returns: The severity of a stuffing-hediff given bodysize and fluid-amount.

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Fluids.Cum.SpecialThingFilterWorker_CumBase
member.summary:
(Simple) Filters for Food to include or non-include cum.
DevNote: Gently taken from Amevarashi-Sexperience https://gitgud.io/amevarashi/rjw-sexperience/-/tree/master/Source/RJWSexperience/Cum/FilterWorkers?ref_type=heads

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Fluids.Slug.SexFluidIngestionDoer_ConsumeSlug
member.summary: Adds up to MAX_SEVERITY (Default=0.2f) Toxic Buildup to the receiver upon consuming Slug.

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Gathering.MechPassiveFluidGathererComp
member.summary: Does basically the same as the Passive-Fluid Gatherer but checks that it's only for mechs that have power.

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Gathering.PassiveFluidGathererComp
member.summary:
Unlike `FluidGatheringBuilding` that works upon nearby sex, the PassiveFluidGatherer is trying to clean nearby floors from Filth. Due to logic, they must be in the same room.
Important: For this to work properly, the ThingWithComp needs to have a `Normal` to run CompTick

member.name: F:Cumpilation.Gathering.PassiveFluidGathererComp.GatheredFilth
member.summary: Stores the currently running information on how much of which filth was soaked in. Important: This will reset on loading a game. Currently I have no plan on changing this.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Gathering.PassiveFluidGathererComp.FilthToItem
member.summary: Checks the current `GatheredFilth` and spawns any item inside me if there is enough Filth gathered of the right kind. The logic for how much and what you need is done by `FluidGatheringDef`s.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Gathering.PassiveFluidGathererComp.CleanFilth(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{RimWorld.Filth})
member.summary: Sucks up all supported Filths (determined by the Def in PassiveFluidGathererCompProperties) and stores them in the GatheredFilth. Depending on your settings, there is a chance for filth to disappear or that only one thing at a time is cleaned.
member.param: A list of all Filths to be considered.

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Gathering.FluidGatheringBuilding
member.summary: Extension that can be added to (storage) buildings, to gather fluids on orgasm. This is meant to manage things at `Patch_SatisfyPersonal_FillFluidGatherers`.

member.name: F:Cumpilation.Gathering.FluidGatheringBuilding.range
member.summary: The range in which fluids are gathered on Orgasm

member.name: F:Cumpilation.Gathering.FluidGatheringBuilding.supportedFluids
member.summary: All supported fluids, so that a cumbucket cannot collect girl-cum.

member.name: F:Cumpilation.Gathering.FluidGatheringBuilding.collectsFromInternal
member.summary: "true" will work for all Sextypes, "false" will only work for Handjob, Footjob, etc. things on the outside.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Gathering.GatheringUtility.GetNearbyFilth(Verse.Thing,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a list of all Filths that are within a given range, and within the same room of this Comps parent. When `onlyFluidFilth` is true, only filth that is specified in a rjw.SexFluidDef will be considered.
member.param: If true, only Filth that is mentioned in rjw.SexFluidDefs are returned
Filter for the horicontal distance to the parent.
member.returns: A list of Fitlhs in the same room of the parent, filtered for SexFluids and/or range.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Gathering.GatheringUtility.IsSupportedFilthType(RimWorld.Filth,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{rjw.SexFluidDef})
member.summary: Small helper that checks for a filth if the Gatherer can handle is. This consist of checking if the filth is in a (supported) fluidDef, or if there is a filth specified in a gatheringDef.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Gathering.GatheringUtility.AddFluidToSink(rjw.SexFluidDef,System.Single,Verse.Building)
member.summary:
Other big method, used when there are other sources of fluid coming into the Sinks. This happens for example on JobDrivers that Clean Bukkake.
If everything works out, the correct item is spawned, following the FluidGatheringDef.
member.param: The fluid coming in, can be unsupported and nothing will happen.
The amount of fluid coming in.
The potential sink that the building

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Gathering.Patch_CasualSexHelper_FindNearbyBucketToMasturbate
member.summary:
Changes the Position that (Player) Pawns want to Masturbate at. If there is a supported and free Fluid-Gatherer (Sink), a position next to it will be chosen.
Extracted and Extended behaviour from Amevarashi Sexperience: https://gitgud.io/amevarashi/rjw-sexperience/-/blob/master/Source/RJWSexperience/Patches/RJW_Patch.cs#L123

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Gathering.Patch_CasualSexHelper_FindNearbyBucketToMasturbate.Prefix(Verse.Pawn,Verse.Pawn,Verse.IntVec3@)
member.summary: If masturbation and current map has a bucket, return location near the bucket
member.param: The place to stand near a bucket

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Oscillation.OscillationHelper.GetOrCreateBlueBallsHediff(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: Gets (or creates) a BlueBall Hediff for the pawn, located in the Genitals BodyPart. The severity is set later in case of a new creation.

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Reactions.ThoughtDefExtension_StageFromConsumption
member.summary: Initially taken from Ameravashis Sexperience, extended to cover multiple fluids, optional quirks and traits that hardwire results.

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Reactions.IngestionOutcomeDoer_RecordEatenFluid
member.summary:
Handles the updating (and thought-giving) when pawns consume meals with fluid based ingredients.
To work, there need to be two defs: - A RecordFluidMappingDef - The IngestionOutComeDoer
Originally, this was from Amaverashi-Sexperience but extended for multiple fluids. https://gitgud.io/amevarashi/rjw-sexperience/-/blob/master/Source/RJWSexperience/Cum/IngestionOutcomeDoer_RecordEatenCum.cs?ref_type=heads

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Reactions.Patches.Patch_IngestMeal_UpdateRecordAndGiveThoughts
member.summary:
I have one IngestionOutcomeDoer but it's not enough. The individual outcome-doers are not used in meals. This triggers all (relevant) ingredients to give their thoughts. This also means that if a meal is made of cum and insect jelly, the eater will get two thoughts.
TODO: Right now, the "NumEaten" is updated, but the "AmountEaten" is buggy. But as it gives the right thoughts, I am decently happy for now.

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Reactions.Thought_Recordbased
member.summary: Thought class that uses record to select active stage Initially taken from Ameravashis Sexperience, extended to cover multiple fluids, optional quirks and traits that hardwire results.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Reactions.Thought_Recordbased.TryMergeWithExistingMemory(System.Boolean@)
member.summary: This method is called for every thought right after the pawn is assigned
